Iodine shell structure

1s2 {2s2 2p6} {3s2 3p6 3d10} {4s2 4p6 4d10} {5s2 5p5}


Total number of electrons: 53
Shell 1: 2
Shell 2: 8
Shell 3: 18
Shell 4: 18
Shell 5: 7

Outer 2 shells: 25 electrons
Inner 3 shells: 28 electrons

CRYSTAL syntax
0 = s
1 = sp
2 = p
3 = d
4 = f

Type of basis set: 0 is general (exponent and contration coefficients defined)
